title: How to Have a Positive Attitude (for Teens)

steps.title: Be proactive and think about things ahead of time so you end up with happy moments instead of just waiting around for bad ones.
steps.content: Be proactive and think about things ahead of time so you end up with happy moments instead of just waiting around for bad ones. [1] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Business Review Online and print journal covering topics related to business management practices Go to source

steps.title: Even the bad moments are a part of life and you don't need to let them drag you down.
steps.content: Even the bad moments are a part of life and you don't need to let them drag you down. Things happen. Just let it go.

steps.title: Gratitude is a simple way to make you appreciate your life so much more.
steps.content: Gratitude is a simple way to make you appreciate your life so much more. There's nothing wrong with having dreams or goals, but in the meantime, enjoy what you have... even though it may not be much. [2] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source

steps.title: When you have the chance to improve yourself or try something new, don't sit around at home and wonder and think about the pros and cons.
steps.content: When you have the chance to improve yourself or try something new, don't sit around at home and wonder and think about the pros and cons. Just jump in with two feet and do it! New experiences are a great way to help you enjoy your life. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Learn to laugh and people will be grateful.
steps.content: Learn to laugh and people will be grateful. Laughing creates such a positive energy within you and those who can hear you. [4] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Don't take your life too seriously... be willing to admit that yes, some moments are funny. [5] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source

steps.title: No one can take your dreams from you as long as you're still breathing.
steps.content: No one can take your dreams from you as long as you're still breathing. If you have determination and will power, you can do almost anything. Success is whatever you determine it to be and you can be successful. Even when you do nothing, you are still creating your life so why not make it something to remember? [6] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source

steps.title: At the end of the day, write down the best thing that happened to you.
steps.content: At the end of the day, write down the best thing that happened to you. Don't go into the details of your fight with your best friend, don't start writing about how your mom is completely rude and unfair. Write something good that happened or something that you realized or a cool poem or quote that you found. Think of one funny thing that happened that day as well if you can. Feel free to write it in your journal, next to the one good thing that happened. This will help with your sense of humor.

steps.title: This will help you feel better about yourself and give you something to look forward to when you get out of bed in the morning.
steps.content: This will help you feel better about yourself and give you something to look forward to when you get out of bed in the morning.

steps.title: The world looks different through the lens of a camera and it may help you to get the perspective you need.
steps.content: The world looks different through the lens of a camera and it may help you to get the perspective you need. Take pictures of anything you want. It doesn't have to be of just your friends. Special places and favorite plants or flowers are good things to start with too.
